ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_issubg3 | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ A. x e. S ( ( invg ` G ) ` x ) e. S ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ A. x e. S ( ( invg ` G ) ` x ) e. S ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ibi | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ A. x e. S ( ( invg ` G ) ` x ) e. S ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
